description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, strategically located at the confluence of the Ganga, Gandak, and Burhi Gandak rivers. As part of the Munger transport division, it handles crucial administrative functions including vehicle registrations, driving license issuance, and enforcement of transport safety regulations. This office manages the transportation needs of seven administrative blocks, facilitating connectivity and logistics for the region's agricultural and river-based trade.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
